title: [1.11.2] Vonafarth-32x
author: 夜頥瑿
txt_content:
本帖最后由 夜頥瑿 于 2017-1-8 14:30 编辑 

Vonafarthv0.46
Vonafarh材质包基于John Smith材质包，但随着时间的推移，它的很多材质纹理将被完全替换.这个资源包使mc进入中世纪幻想之中..到目前为止，此材质包只有alpha版本，有很多的错误以及缺陷，未来的更新将修复它们为保证效果请一定要安装Optifine高清修复!没有高清修复部分模型材质将无法正常运作，还有请在设置内打开连接纹理，关闭天空：）
■作者原文■v.0.46 
Vonafarh resourcepack based on John Smith, but over time a lot of textures from it will be completely replaced. 
This resourcepack developed to dip into the world of Minecraft medieval fantasy. 


I like resourcepack Conquest_, because he is simply superb! So I decided to do something similar, but in its own way. So far, only the alpha version, so you can

 estimate how things will look. Who is made not so much, there are a lot of errors and defects. Future updates will fix it. 
Also the textures you can download Soundpack, which is almost completed. I recommend to try it - you will definitely enjoy it! But adjust the volume of the game for you. 

You need Optifine! Without it will not work correctly. So turn on the connecting texture, turn off the sky in the settings details.

■图片欣赏■



■历史更新■暂无

■下载地址■请优先点击原贴下载，支持作者！原贴下载：https://mods.curse.com/texture-packs/minecraft/256572-vonafarth#t1:description备用百度云：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1jILnoe6

replies.author: Behemoth
replies.txt_content: 是我的问题吗，下了用不了材质包里按了完成后材质会自动回到左边。
很棒的材质，天空好评，感谢分享

replies.author: 抢你妹丶
replies.txt_content: 就决定用这个材质啦，太棒了楼主~
